artist: Publisher: Theodore Galle; Delineator: After Albrecht Dürer; Engraver: Cornelis Cort
description: half length portrait of artist seated facing right with right arm on table and gloves in left hand

below image in black: 6  BERN. ORLEIO, BRVXELLENSI  PICTORI / eight lines of Latin verse \"auliaca quod fese Bernardo ....Ante numifma Philippos\" / Th. Galle excud | in plate at top: Floruit Bruxellis anno 1530   .6. | on sheet in pencil: 2-143
title: Portrait of Bernard van Orley
